meanings.definition: The act of presenting or exhibiting something.
meanings.sent1: The showings of artwork at the gallery were well attended.
meanings.sent2: The professor's showings of scientific experiments were always informative.
meanings.sent3: The showings of magic tricks at the party amazed everyone.
meanings.sent4: Her showings of kindness towards others were truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The showings of talent at the talent show left the audience in awe.

meanings.definition: A demonstration or display of a particular quality or trait.
meanings.sent1: The athlete's showings of strength impressed the crowd.
meanings.sent2: The showings of courage during the rescue mission were commendable.
meanings.sent3: His showings of humor always lightened the mood in the office.
meanings.sent4: The showings of loyalty from the dog towards its owner were heartwarming.
meanings.sent5: The showings of intelligence in the research findings were groundbreaking.

meanings.definition: The number of times a movie or play is presented in a theater.
meanings.sent1: The showings of the new movie attracted a large audience.
meanings.sent2: The showings of the play were scheduled at different times for convenience.
meanings.sent3: The showings of the film were so popular that additional screenings were added.
meanings.sent4: The showings of the classic play brought back nostalgic memories for many.
meanings.sent5: The showings of the documentary shed light on an important issue.
